title: Tic Tac Wear
summary: The Classic Tic Tac Toe game which can now also be played on your Android Wear.
description: The Classic Tic Tac Toe game which can now also be played on your favourite Android Wear device like LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live or Moto 360.The game has two modes whereby you can either play against the AI(Artificial Intelligence) or against your friend.Enjoy the game on your mobile as well as on your Android Wear device.
descriptionHTML:
The Classic Tic Tac Toe game which can now also be played on your favourite Android Wear device like LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live or Moto 360.

The game has two modes whereby you can either play against the AI(Artificial Intelligence) or against your friend.

Enjoy the game on your mobile as well as on your Android Wear device.
comments: Fun time waster Maybe add difficulty setting because I can never win...
It doesn't have a smartwatch option
Best one for wear By far the one that works best with the Hwatch
